fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Budget, Trade, Consumers, Single market, Public Health, Food Safety
eu_initiatives:
Interporc is currently following regulation from the European Council, European Parliament and the European Commission concerning: Agriculture, Public Health, Food Safety, Animal Welfare, Consumer Protection and Trade. 
 
In addition, Interporc is following the initiatives taken by DG AGRI, DG SANTE and DG TRADE.
organisation_name: Organización Interprofesional Agroalimentaria del Porcino de Capa Blanca (INTERPORC)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
The purpose of Interporc is the development of actions that benefit the entire value chain of the white-coat pig sector. A series of objectives has been set for this. 
 
-Contribute to the economic development and profitability of the sector and support its internationalization process. 
 
-Improve the perception of meat and processed white pork by transferring to consumers and health professionals their nutritional properties, health benefits and high quality. 
 
-Promote innovation and applied research to solve problems specific to the pig sector. 
 
-To boost the image of the pig sector as an example of sustainable production. 
 
-Bring together sector concerns along the entire value chain.
inter_groups: Interporc participates in those groups that the European Parliament invite us to join
